blic unit offering reuters staff   acasti pharma inc

text: April 23, 2018 / 8:36 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Acasti Pharma Announces Overnight Marketed Public Unit Offering Reuters Staff   Acasti Pharma Inc: * ACASTI PHARMA ANNOUNCES OVERNIGHT MARKETED PUBLIC UNIT OFFERING * ACASTI PHARMA INC - EACH UNIT IN OFFERING COMPRISING ONE COMMON SHARE AND ONE COMMON SHARE PURCHASE WARRANT * ACASTI PHARMA - PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING, WITH CASH ON HAND TO BE USED BY CO FOR DEVELOPMENT OF CAPRE, ADVANCEMENT OF COâ€˜S PHASE 3 PROGRAM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
